name: Child Health Problem
description: Your baby has jaundice. What will you do?
choices: [ Go to hospital, Don't care about her/him, Go to the pharmacy to buy medicine, Make delicious meals for her/him ]

name: Child Health Problem
description: Your kid ate peanuts and had an allergic reaction. What will you do?
choices: [ Drive her/him to hospital, Call 911, Don’t care about her/him, Give him the allergy medication we have on hand at home ]

name: Your health Problem
description: I was suffering from the flu. What will you do?
choices: [ Go to hospital by yourself, call your Mom/Dad, Go to the pharmacy to buy medicine, Allow your immune system to fight against the virus ]

name: Your health Problem
description: I have been diagnosed with depression. What will you do?
choices: [ Confide in a close friend, Cut ties with good friends, Have a heart-to-heart talk with parents, Suicide ]

name: Your health Problem
description: My eyesight has been worsening. What will you do?
choices: [ let your parents take you to the optometrist, borrow your sister’s glasses, Ignore it, crying hard because you are afraid of going blind  ]

name: Pet’s health Problem
description: Your dog accidentally ate some chocolate. What will you do?
choices: [ Taking her/him to Veterinary Hospital, Praying for her/him, Crying in helplessness, Giving her/him a laxative ]

name: Parents’ health Problem
description: Your father has heart disease. What will you do?
choices: [ Spending a significant amount of money to find the best doctor to perform surgery on my father, Cut ties with your dad, Call my grandfather, Buy a lot of supplements for him ]

name: Brother
description: Your big brother has confessed to you that he is considering coming out of the closet. What will you do?
choices: [ Support him unconditionally, Ignore him, Ridicule him, Tell your parents ]

name: Relationship Issue
description: While shopping, I discovered that my boyfriend/girlfriend was cheating on me. What will you do?
choices: [ Break up with her/him, Pretend nothing happened, Punch him, Cheat on her/him too ]

name: Stalker
description: You just discovered that your ex posted an ad for free golden retriever puppies using your phone number in the contact info. What will you do?
choices: [ File a restraining order, Ignore him, Ask him to leave you alone, Do the same thing to me ]

name: Adopting a dog
description: While walking, you see a stray dog. What will you do?
choices: [ Adopt him/her, Look for its owner in the vicinity, Walk away briskly, Feed it food ]

name: Parents
description: Your parents don’t like your girlfriend/boyfriend, persuading you to break up with her/him. What will you do?
choices: [ Fight with your parents and say “none of your business”, Break up with her/him, Ignore it by remaining silent, Talk to them with patience ]

name: Crushing on someone
description: You fall in love with someone at first sight when you are working out at the gym. What will you do?
choices: [ Asking her/him out, Have a silent crush,  Call a friend and ask what to do, Work ing out with him]

name: Pregnant
description: You become pregnant with your boyfriend’s baby. What will you do?
choices: [ Have an abortion, Ask your boyfriend’s advice, Ask your parents’ advice, Decide to have this baby ]

name: Indecent Proposal
description: While hanging out with your friend, her boyfriend confesses that he has always craved you. What will you do?
choices: [ Ignore him, Hook up with him, Report him to your friend, Tell him it’s a bad behaviour ]

name: Interview
description: You are asked the following question when you are interviewing. Where do you see yourself in 5 years? How will you respond?
choices: [ Walking the dog in the park, As a leading expert, Collaborating with you, Traveling around the world ]

name: Interview
description: While being interviewed for the Business Analyst position at Valley Insurance. You are asked the following question. “Do you handle conflict well?” How will you respond
choices: [ Are you coming at me bro, I cower when confronted, I kick ass and take names, Conflict is challenging for me ]

name: Seductress
description: Your supervisor just asked if you want to hook up in the break room. What will you do?
choices: [ Get at it, Reject her advances, Report her to HR, Tell your colleagues ]

name: Rumor
description: Your co-worker started a rumor that you have a dominating fetish. What will you do?
choices: [ Have a talk with her, Pay no attention, Start a rumor about her, Attack her ]

name: Lemon Drop
description: While chilling at the club, someone buys a round of lemon drops for everyone. Will you have one?
choices: [ I don’t pass on free drinks, No, I’m good ]

name: Champagne
description: While out fishing, A man asks you if you’d like to go have a glass of champagne at the pub. Will you go?
choices: [ He seems nice enough, Sorry, I have somewhere to be ]

name: Funeral Planning
description: Your father passed away. It’s time to decide what to do with your father’s remains. His wish was to be cremated. What will you do?
choices: [ Bury him, Cremate him, Have him taxidermied, Donate his body to science ]

name: Lost Card
description: One morning on your way to University, you realize you lost your credit card
choices: [ Forget about it, Look for it, Put hold on it ]
